      • writeValue

        public void writeValue​(SimpleWriter wri,
                       java.lang.String propertyName,
                       ExtendedCSSValue value)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: StyleFormattingContext
        Write a css value to the given writer.
        Specified by:
        writeValue in interface StyleFormattingContext
        Parameters:
        wri - the writer.
        propertyName - the name of the property whose value is being printed.
        value - the value to write.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error happened while writing.

      • writeShorthandValue

        public void writeShorthandValue​(SimpleWriter wri,
                                java.lang.String shorthandName,
                                CSSShorthandValue value)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: StyleFormattingContext
        Serialize a css shorthand value to the given writer.

        Although the CSSShorthandValue type contains priority information, this method only writes the value.

        Specified by:
        writeShorthandValue in interface StyleFormattingContext
        Parameters:
        wri - the writer.
        shorthandName - the name of the shorthand property whose value is being printed.
        value - the value to write.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error happened while writing.
